aguiaj.cards.util

Class CardStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • aguiaj.cards.util.CardStack

  • public class CardStack
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents card stacks, which can be displayed according to different modes: all cards hidden, only the top card visible, all cards shown.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardStack()
      Constructs an empty card stack.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICard[] allCards()
      Obtain all cards of the stack, ordered from the bottom-most to the top-most of card of the stack.
      int getSize()
      Number of cards in the stack.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Is the stack empty?
      ICard pick()
      Remove the top card of the stack.
      void put(ICard card)
      Put a card on top of the stack.
      ICard topCard()
      Obtain the card that is on top of the stack.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardStack

        public CardStack()
        Constructs an empty card stack.
        Parameters:
        mode - Display mode

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Number of cards in the stack.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Is the stack empty?

      • topCard

        public ICard topCard()
        Obtain the card that is on top of the stack.
        Returns:
        The top card, or null if the stack is empty

      • allCards

        public ICard[] allCards()
        Obtain all cards of the stack, ordered from the bottom-most to the top-most of card of the stack.
        Returns:
        An array of cards with length equal to the number of cards of the stack

      • put

        public void put(ICard card)
        Put a card on top of the stack.
        Parameters:
        card - The card to be placed.

      • pick

        public ICard pick()
        Remove the top card of the stack.
        Returns:
        The top card.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the stack is empty
